SELECT m1.memberIdx, membership, m1.userId, userName, m1.regDate, m1.pwdDate, lastLogin, enabled, email, tel, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId
AND enabled = #{enabled}
AND m.membership < 90
ORDER BY regDate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
